channel.title: Freeze in Blast Pit
channel.description: Hello. This is my first post in the format so I apologize if the format is not correct. I would like to report a bug I found in Blast Pit. The problem is the game will freeze and crash and will have to be restarted. This happens in bm_c1a4c a few seconds after starting the fan. I was able to reproduce this glitch multiple times by saving right before it happens. It happened regardless of which weapon I held. I believe it started immediately as the fan spooled up and the wind effect began to happen. I took status in the developer console seconds before it happened: hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c1a4c at: -3877 x, -611 y, -991 z players : 1 (1 max) # userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 4 "fdisk" UNKNOWN 00:20 34 0 active loopback Here are my computer specs: ASUS M4A785-M Motherboard AMD Phenom 9750 Quad Core Processor 2.40 GHz Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit 6.00 GB RAM (5.75 GB Usable), 3x2GB DDR3 ATI Radeon HD 4200 (Integrated) ST31000520AS 1.0TB HDD I can provide more details if needed. I was able to continue my game by doing this again except without killing the zombie in the little room with the shotgun ammo (I just grabbed the ammo and avoided the zombie). I will also include a copy of one of the dump files created by Source SDK 2007. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T2_33_5C0.mdmp (95 KB)

item.title: Freeze in Blast Pit
item.dc:creator: fdisk
item.description:
Hello. This is my first post in the format so I apologize if the format is not correct. I would like to report a bug I found in Blast Pit. The problem is the game will freeze and crash and will have to be restarted. This happens in bm_c1a4c a few seconds after starting the fan. I was able to reproduce this glitch multiple times by saving right before it happens. It happened regardless of which weapon I held. I believe it started immediately as the fan spooled up and the wind effect began to happen. I took status in the developer console seconds before it happened:

hostname: Half-Life 2
version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure
map : bm_c1a4c at: -3877 x, -611 y, -991 z
players : 1 (1 max)

userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr

4 “fdisk” UNKNOWN 00:20 34 0 active loopback

Here are my computer specs:
ASUS M4A785-M Motherboard
AMD Phenom 9750 Quad Core Processor 2.40 GHz
Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
6.00 GB RAM (5.75 GB Usable), 3x2GB DDR3
ATI Radeon HD 4200 (Integrated)
ST31000520AS 1.0TB HDD
I can provide more details if needed.

I was able to continue my game by doing this again except without killing the zombie in the little room with the shotgun ammo (I just grabbed the ammo and avoided the zombie). I will also include a copy of one of the dump files created by Source SDK 2007.
